name: Meta Knightmare Basics (A Baldi's Basics Mod)
name_original: Meta Knightmare Basics (A Baldi's Basics Mod)
description:
It's Here, My First Baldi's Basics Mod Which I Made Back In 2018.  Also, I Was To Lazy To Do The Plot, Sorry! Please Note The Screenshots You See Here Are Not Final.

Characters

Meta Knight = Baldi

Jetzuka = Playtime

Sword Knight = Principal Of The Thing

Blade Knight = Arts & Crafters

Javelin Knight = 1st Prize

Sweep Knight = Gotta Sweep

Dark Meta Knight = Its A Bully

This Game Isn't What You Think It Is.

It's A Mod Of Baldi's Basics Classic 1.4.3, But With Donkey Kong As The Main Character. And It's Also Inspired By Stupid Educational 90s Games Like I.M. Meen, Sonic's Schoolhouse And Etc.

FAQ

Where's Karen? I Can't Find Her! 

Well, I Removed Karen Because She's Not Owned By Nintendo.

Can I Do A Let's Play Of This Game On Youtube?

Yes! I'd Love To See People Playing My Baldi's Basics Mods!

Credits

Original Baldi's Basics Game By Mystman12 (AKA Micah McGonical)

Mod Created By Kyle Gamer 19

Kirby Franchise Made By Nintendo And HAL Laboratory 

Special Thanks To All Of the Members In The Official Kyle Gamer 19 Discord Server

And One Huge Special Thanks To The Youtubers Who Played My Mods.

Tools Used:

  • GIMP
  • Audacity
  • Unity Asset Bundle Extractor
  • dnSpy

Thanks For Playing!
